text: Wei River (渭河 or 渭水) is a major river in western's China's Shaanxi and Gansu provinces and the largest tributary of the Yellow River. Wei River may also refer to: *Wei River (Shandong) (卫河), a river in northern China's Shandong province and a tributary of the Hai River *Wei River (Xiang River) (沩水河 or 沩江 or 沩河), a small river in southern China's Hunan province and a tributary of the Xiang River *Wei River (Hebei), a part of the Bohai Sea basin *Wei River (Hubei) (洈水), a river in central China's Hubei province ==See also== *Wei (disambiguation) *Weihe (disambiguation)
title: Wei River (disambiguation)
